thread.title: $500,000 Raised For Craig Sager's Foundation, No Thanks To Stephen Curry
thread.title_full: $500,000 Raised For Craig Sager's Foundation, No Thanks To Stephen Curry

author: Timothy Burke on Screengrabber, shared by Timothy Burke to Deadspin
title: $500,000 Raised For Craig Sager's Foundation, No Thanks To Stephen Curry
text:
A celebrity three-point challenge followed by a series of Stephen Curry bricks led to Craig Sager’s son—with help from Shaquille O’Neal—sinking a bucket that led to a $500,000 donation to the Sagerstrong Foundation. Advertisement 
(So, as it turns out, it didn’t matter how many threes the celebrities and NBA stars hit, and Curry was probably bricking the shots on purpose, but whatever.) 
[TNT]
